article_title: Top 20 CEOs with the worst, best reputations
article_text:
Reputation Management Consultants is in the business of burnishing tarnished reputations, so there’s more than a hint of irony in its just-out list of CEOs with the worst reputations.

After all, this is a company whose business is built on setting things right for CEOs who, for one reason or another, have drawn negative attention.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allen Greenberg
article_metadata.description: The reputation rankings of 20 CEOs, according to a firm that makes its money by polishing tarnished reps.
